long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever land on the YouTube Homepage and slip into the recommended rabbit hole? Reclaim your focus and productivity with YouTube Blocker! This chrome extension removes everything EXCEPT the YouTube search bar from your youtube homepage so that you can focus on watching the videos you intend to.

Elements removed from homepage:
- Recommended videos
- "Chips" (tags at top of screen)
- Left hand navigation menu

If you find this helpful feel free to donate - anything helps: https://paypal.me/hanskang1

Have a great day!
